data.title: Great meals for kids!
data.text: Stopped here to eat in at this location as I generally go through the drive thru. Stopped here with my niece and her children. The happy meals are fun and nutritious for kids. I tried the Artisan Grilled Chicken Sandwich. The portion is good but still overpriced at $4.99 for the sandwich only and $7.19 for the "value??" meal. Seems like everytime I visit McDonalds these days the prices are higher than the last visit. Can't see how they can call them "value" meals when they cost so much?

data.title: Great Frappe Mochas!
data.text: Stopped here for the great Frappe Mocha drinks tonight. Always thirst quencing. Staff was very friendly and on the ball this evening.

data.title: nice staff
data.text: Just fun & nice staff - always nice to our dogs and happy.   Great food - thanks for being there (the one far down - not the new one by the old people's home)

data.title: Its McDonalds
data.text:
I love the option to review a McDonald's. Truth is it has to be the best restaurant in the US because if you like consistency they cant be beat. The food is the same in Florida as it is in Mn. 
Hey you know what you are getting so go get your egg mcmuffin and be satisfied.

data.title: Just another solid McDonald's
data.text: I visited this McDonald's twice during my stay in Plymouth, and both times they delivered exactly what I expected from McDonalds -- hot food that I felt guilty about eating. The staff were always fast and friendly, and the restaurant was clean. All good stuff.

data.title: Good service
data.text: I don't typically go to fast food restaurants, but having kids, I do like to stop by McDonald's once in a while when we are short on time.  I've always had good service and hot food at the McDonald's in Plymouth.  I love their fries!
